body.p: The tools menu provides access to a number of tools available for working with Simal repositories. This document provides an overview of these tools.

section.title: Developer Tools
section.p: The developer tools are provided to assist developers working on Simal. They are of little or no interest to most end-users.

section.title: Add Test Data
section.p: This tool adds some useful test data to a repository. This is useful when creating a new repository instance and allows you to quickly add data set to the repository in a single click.

section.title: Pre-Alpha Tools
section.p: These tools are in development and experimental. They may appear and disappear from release to release without warning. Furthermore, they may not actually work. These are only for the adventurous and certainly should not be relied upon in a production environment.
For more information on any of these tools please see our Developer mailing list.
